description: An Italian dessert made of layers of espresso-dipped ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese. Topped with cocoa powder for a rich, indulgent flavor.
A classic French dessert consisting of a creamy vanilla custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar. The contrast between the crunchy sugar topping and the smooth custard is heavenly.
A creamy and decadent dessert made with a graham cracker crust and a filling of cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Can be served plain or topped with fruit, chocolate, or caramel for added flavor.
